snippet.title: James Lee Sorenson Language and Communication Center
snippet.description:
* 6.
James Lee Sorenson Language and Communication Center
?
800 Florida Ave NE (at Gallaudet University)
Academic Building •
* AIA National • March 1, 2012Every aspect of the architecture firm SmithGroupJJR's design of the center facilitates the use of sign language. The firm's design earned AIA DC's Presidential Citation for Universal Design in 2011.
